awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win.

fullplot: A THOUSAND ACRES is a drama about an American family who meets with tragedy on their land. It is the story of a father, his daughters, and their husbands, and their passion to subdue the history of their land and its stories.
plot: "King Lear" set on a farm in Iowa.
title: A Thousand Acres

tomatoes.consensus: A Thousand Acres makes disappointingly sudsy stuff out of the source material, but benefits from solid performances by a strong cast.
